scripts.start:mobile: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run start --workspace mobile
scripts.start:api: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run dev --workspace api
scripts.start:admin: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run dev --workspace admin-web
scripts.start:api:prod: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run build --workspace api && npm run start --workspace api
scripts.start:admin:prod: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run build --workspace admin-web && npm run start --workspace admin-web
scripts.build:api: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run build --workspace api
scripts.verify:fast: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run build --workspace api && npm run build --workspace admin-web && npx tsc --noEmit -p mobile/tsconfig.json
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:fast && npm run smoke:stack && npm run test:critical-flow
